item.title: nginx: [emerg] bind() to 0.0.0.0:80 failed (98: Address already in use)
item.description: Untuk mengatasi error nginx seperti dibawah ini nginx: [emerg] bind() to 0.0.0.0:80 failed (98: Address already in use) Jalankan perintah berikut sudo fuser -k 80/tcp service nginx start Semoga aman servermu :))
